snippet.title: Resident Evil 3 - Seamless HD Project - 1.0 In-game footage (Dolphin HD Texture pack)
snippet.description:
Download the pack here: 👉 https://www.reshdp.com/re3/ 👈

RE3SHDP is an HD texture pack for the Gamecube version of Resident Evil 3 running on Dolphin.
This video is showcasing the version 1.0 of the pack. 

The video is showing the HD textures being activated and deactivated on the fly. This can be done by pressing the DELETE key while playing.

This video also showcase our optional and experimental FMV replacement pack.

Custom-made tools have been used to prevent the apparition of seams where the masks are displayed on top of the backgrounds. This is done by recreating the Mask textures from fully processed backgrounds through analyzing and exploiting the game's data.

~~ Credits ~~

The tools, the Dolphin modifications and the texture pipeline were developed by MoArtis (https://twitter.com/MoArtis) 

The textures were processed and upscaled by Kayael (https://www.youtube.com/user/MaxinestTeam) using Gigapixel and Photoshop.

The different versions of the pack were tested by Saeed.

Additional arts by FrankWesker (https://twitter.com/FrankWeskerFkw)

Have a nice day!

~~~~~

RESHDP is a fan project under fair use.
RESIDENT EVIL is a registered trademark of CAPCOM CO., LTD.
© 1998 Capcom Co., Ltd All Rights Reserved.
